mapper.insert: insert into lessontype (lessonId,courseCnt, lessonType, teachingWay, gradeId, lessonPrice, lessonName, gradeName, needBook, discountPrice, isholiday, singleCoursePrice) values (#{lessonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseCnt,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{lessonType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teachingWay,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gradeId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{lessonPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{lessonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needBook,jdbcType=BIT}, #{discountPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{isholiday,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{singleCoursePrice,jdbcType=REAL}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE courseCnt=VALUES(courseCnt),lessonPrice=VALUES(lessonPrice),gradeId=VALUES(gradeId),gradeName=VALUES(gradeName), discountPrice=VALUES(discountPrice),singleCoursePrice=VALUES(singleCoursePrice)
mapper.select: SELECT a.lessonType,a.orderId,a.createTime , a.memberId, c.`name`, a.parentId, b.parentName, b.telNum, a.purchaseNum FROM orders a LEFT JOIN parents b ON a.parentId = b.parentId LEFT JOIN student c ON a.memberId = c.memberId WHERE a.orderType = 2;
